location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Trans-Persian Railway: Minute by the Marquess of Crewe'

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the foliation sequence commences and terminates at f 27, as it is part of a larger physical volume; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the bottom right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The memorandum consists of short minute by Robert Offley Ashburton Crewe-Milnes (Marquess of Crewe and Secretary of State for India), which argues against the construction of a Trans-Persian Railway linking Europe and India.

name.namePart: Secretary of State for India, United Kingdom
